nodes.text: Malfkla Yzu was a male Human and one of the thirteen Imperial warlords killed by Admiral Natasi Daala at Tsoss Beacon in 12 ABY. Under the Empire, Yzu was an admiral in the 15th Deep Core Reserve Fleet. Foga Brill, the Planetary Governor of Prakith, became his close friend and advisor, and Yzu promoted him to Moff.
